20 struct Color
21 {
23  Color()
24  : r(0), g(0), b(0), a(0) {}
26  Color(int r_, int g_, int b_, int a_ = 255)
27  : r(r_), g(g_), b(b_), a(a_) {}
28 
29  int r;
30  int g;
31  int b;
32  int a;
33 };

40 struct Point
41 {
43  Point()
44  : x(0), y(0) {}
46  Point(int x_, int y_)
47  : x(x_), y(y_) {}
48 
49  int x;
50  int y;
51 };

62  : x(0), y(0) {}
64  PointF(double x_, double y_)
65  : x(x_), y(y_) {}
66

68  double y;
69 };

76 struct Rectangle
77 {
79  Rectangle()
80  : x(0), y(0), width(0), height(0) {}
82  Rectangle(int x_, int y_, int width_, int height_)
83  : x(x_), y(y_), width(width_), height(height_) {}
84 
86  bool isEmpty() const { return (!width && !height); }
87 
88  int x;
89  int y;
90  int width;
91  int height;
92 };
93 
99 struct RectangleF
100 {
102  RectangleF()
103  : x(0), y(0), width(0), height(0) {}
105  RectangleF(double x_, double y_, double width_, double height_)
106  : x(x_), y(y_), width(width_), height(height_) {}
107 
108  double x;
109  double y;
110  double width;
111  double height;
112 };

138 struct Vector3D
139 {
141  Vector3D()
142  : x(0), y(0), z(0) {}
144  Vector3D(double x_, double y_, double z_)
145  : x(x_), y(y_), z(z_) {}
146 
147  double x;
148  double y;
149  double z;
150 };

157 struct Box3D
158 {
160  Box3D() {}
162  Box3D(const Vector3D &center_, const Vector3D &extent_)
163  : center(center_), extent(extent_) {}
164 
165  Vector3D center;
166  Vector3D extent;
167 };
168 
170 inline bool operator==(const Color &clr1, const Color &clr2)
171 {
172  return (clr1.r == clr2.r && clr1.g == clr2.g &&
173  clr1.b == clr2.b && clr1.a == clr2.a);
174 }
175 
177 inline bool operator==(const Point &pt1, const Point &pt2)
178 {
179  return (pt1.x == pt2.x && pt1.y == pt2.y);
180 }
181 
183 inline bool operator==(const PointF &pt1, const PointF &pt2)
184 {
185  return (pt1.x == pt2.x && pt1.y == pt2.y);
186 }
187 
189 inline bool operator==(const Rectangle &rect1, const Rectangle &rect2)
190 {
191  return (rect1.x == rect2.x && rect1.y == rect2.y &&
192  rect1.width == rect2.width && rect2.height == rect2.height);
193 }
194 
196 inline bool operator==(const RectangleF &rect1, const RectangleF &rect2)
197 {
198  return (rect1.x == rect2.x && rect1.y == rect2.y &&
199  rect1.width == rect2.width && rect2.height == rect2.height);
200 }
201 
203 inline bool operator==(const Vector2D &vec1, const Vector2D &vec2)
204 {
205  return (vec1.x == vec2.x && vec1.y == vec2.y);
206 }
207 
209 inline bool operator==(const Vector3D &vec1, const Vector3D &vec2)
210 {
211  return (vec1.x == vec2.x && vec1.y == vec2.y && vec1.z == vec2.z);
212 }
213 
215 inline bool operator==(const Box3D &box1, const Box3D &box2)
216 {
217  return (box1.center == box2.center && box1.extent == box2.extent);
218 }

220 }
